gurmukhi: kh jIqb kh mrn hY kvn surg kh nrk ]
transliteration: Kah Jeetah Kah Maran Hai Kavan Surag Kah Narak||
translation: What are birth and death? What are heaven and hell?

gurmukhi: ko suGVw ko mUVqw khw qrk Avqrk ]3]203]
transliteration: Ko Soughdaa Ko Moondtaakahaa Tarak Avtarak||3||203||
translation: What are wisdom and foolishness? What are logical and illogical? 3.203.

gurmukhi: ko inMdw js hY kvn kvn pwp kh Drm ]
transliteration: Ko Nindaa Jas Hai Kavan Kavan Paap Kah Dharam||
translation: What are slander and praise? What are sin and rectitude?

gurmukhi: kvn jog ko Bog hY kvn krm Apkrm ]4]204]
transliteration: Kavan Jog Ko Bhog Hai Kavan Karam Apkaram||4||204||
translation: What are enjoyment and ecstasy? What are virtue and vice? 4.204.

gurmukhi: kho su sRm kw so khY dm ko khw khMq ]
transliteration: Kaho Su Sram Kaa So Kahai Dam Ko Kahaa Kahant||
translation: What is called effort? And what shuld endurance be called?

gurmukhi: ko sUrw dwqw kvn kho qMq ko mMq ]5]205]
transliteration: Ko Sooraa Daataa Kavan Kaho Tant Ko Mant||5||205||
translation: Who is hero? And who is Donor? Tell me what are Tantra and Mantra? 5.205.

gurmukhi: khw rMk rwjw kvn hrK sog hY kvn ]
transliteration: Kahaa Rank Raajaa Kavan Harakh Sog Hai Kavan||
translation: Who are the pauper and the king? What are joy and sorrow?

gurmukhi: ko rogI rwgI kvn kho q`q muih qvn ]6]206]
transliteration: Ko Rogoo Raagoo Kavan Kaho Tatt Muh(i) Tavan||6||206||
translation: Who is ailing and who is attached? Tell me their substance. 6.206.

gurmukhi: kvn irst ko pust hY khw siRsit ko cwr ]
transliteration: Kavan Rist Ko Poust Hai Kahaa Sristtee Ko Chaar||
translation: Who are hale and hearty? What is the object of the creation of the world?

gurmukhi: kvn siRsit ko BiRst hY kho skl ibsQwr ]7]207]
transliteration: Kavan Sristtee Ko Bhrist Hai Kaho Sakal Bisthaar||7||207||
translation: Who is superb? And who is defiled? Tell me all in detail.7.207.
